kickstart.description: FSA (Fast Statistical Alignment) http://fsa.sourceforge.net/ AMOS (genome assembly) http://amos.sourceforge.net MUMMER (genome alignment) http://mummer.sourceforge.net

post.file: set path = ( /opt/fsa/bin /opt/mummer/bin /opt/mummer/aux_bin /opt/amos/bin $path ) if ( $?LD_LIBRARY_PATH ) then setenv LD_LIBRARY_PATH /opt/amos/lib/AMOS:$LD_LIBRARY_PATH else setenv LD_LIBRARY_PATH /opt/amos/lib/AMOS endif if ( $?LIBPATH ) then setenv LIBPATH /opt/amos/lib/AMOS:$LIBPATH else setenv LIBPATH /opt/amos/lib/AMOS endif if ( $?PERL5LIB ) then setenv PERL5LIB /opt/amos/lib/AMOS:$PERL5LIB else setenv PERL5LIB /opt/amos/lib/AMOS endif

export PATH=/opt/fsa/bin:/opt/mummer/bin:/opt/mummer/aux_bin:/opt/amos/bin:$PATH export LD_LIBRARY_PATH=/opt/amos/lib/AMOS:$LD_LIBRARY_PATH export LIBPATH=/opt/amos/lib/AMOS:$LIBPATH export PERL5LIB=/opt/amos/lib/AMOS:$PERL5LIB
